theory Euler_Prime
  imports Main
begin

fun p :: "nat ⇒ nat" where
  "p n = n^2 - n + 41"

lemma common_factor:
  assumes "n > 0"
  shows "gcd (p n) (p (n + 1)) > 1 ⟷ n = 41"
proof -
  have "p (n + 1) = (n + 1)^2 - (n + 1) + 41"
    by (simp add: p.simps)
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: gcd_def)
qed

end

theory Consecutive_Even_Numbers
  imports Main
begin

lemma sum_of_squares_even_numbers:
  assumes "x > 0" and "even x"
  shows "((x^2) + ((x + 2)^2) + ((x + 4)^2)) = 12296 ⟹ (x * (x + 2) * (x + 4)) div 8 = 32736"
proof -
  have "x^2 + (x + 2)^2 + (x + 4)^2 = x^2 + (x^2 + 4x + 4) + (x^2 + 8x + 16)"
    by simp
  then have "3 * x^2 + 12 * x + 20 = 12296"
    by simp
  then have "3 * x^2 + 12 * x - 12276 = 0"
    by simp
  then have "x = 38" 
    using quadratic_formula by auto
  then have "x * (x + 2) * (x + 4) = 38 * 40 * 42"
    by simp
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: divide_simps)
qed

end

34.formalization:
theory test
  imports "HOL.Real"
begin

lemma real_inequality: 
  fixes a b :: real
  shows "(abs (a + b)) / (1 + abs (a + b)) ≤ (abs a) / (1 + abs a) + (abs b) / (1 + abs b)"
proof -
  have "abs (a + b) ≤ abs a + abs b"
    by (simp add: abs_triangle_ineq)
  then have "(abs (a + b)) / (1 + abs (a + b)) ≤ (abs a + abs b) / (1 + abs (a + b))"
    by (simp add: divide_right_mono)
  also have "... ≤ (abs a) / (1 + abs a) + (abs b) / (1 + abs b)"
  proof -
    have "abs a / (1 + abs a) + abs b / (1 + abs b) = (abs a * (1 + abs b) + abs b * (1 + abs a)) / ((1 + abs a) * (1 + abs b))"
      by (simp add: field_simps)
    also have "... ≥ (abs a + abs b) / (1 + abs (a + b))"
    proof -
      have "(abs a * (1 + abs b) + abs b * (1 + abs a)) ≥ (abs a + abs b) * (1 + abs (a + b))"
        by (simp add: algebra_simps)
      then show ?thesis
        by (simp add: divide_right_mono)
    qed
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

end

theory test
imports "HOL.Real"
begin

lemma real_inequality: 
  fixes a b :: real
  shows "(abs (a + b)) / (1 + abs (a + b)) ≤ (abs a) / (1 + abs a) + (abs b) / (1 + abs b)"
proof -
  have "abs (a + b) ≤ abs a + abs b"
    by (simp add: abs_triangle_ineq)
  then have "(abs (a + b)) / (1 + abs (a + b)) ≤ (abs a + abs b) / (1 + abs (a + b))"
    by (simp add: divide_right_mono)
  also have "... ≤ (abs a) / (1 + abs a) + (abs b) / (1 + abs b)"
  proof -
    have "abs a / (1 + abs a) + abs b / (1 + abs b) = (abs a * (1 + abs b) + abs b * (1 + abs a)) / ((1 + abs a) * (1 + abs b))"
      by (simp add: field_simps)
    also have "(abs a * (1 + abs b) + abs b * (1 + abs a)) ≥ (abs a + abs b) * (1 + abs (a + b))"
    proof -
      have "(abs a * (1 + abs b) + abs b * (1 + abs a)) ≥ (abs a + abs b) * (1 + abs (a + b))"
        by (simp add: algebra_simps)
      then show ?thesis
        by (simp add: divide_right_mono)
    qed
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

end

3.formalization:
theory test
imports Main
begin

fun p :: "nat ⇒ nat" where
  "p n = n^2 - n + 41"

lemma common_factor:
  assumes "n > 0"
  shows "gcd (p n) (p (n + 1)) > 1 ⟷ n = 41"
proof -
  have "p (n + 1) = (n + 1)^2 - (n + 1) + 41"
    by (simp add: p.simps)
  moreover have "gcd (p n) (p (n + 1)) = gcd (p n) (2n + 1)"
    by (simp add: gcd_nat.simps algebra_simps)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (simp add: gcd_nat.simps)
qed

end

43.formalization:
theory test
imports Main
begin

lemma sum_of_squares_even_numbers:
  assumes "x > 0" and "even x"
  shows "((x^2) + ((x + 2)^2) + ((x + 4)^2)) = 12296 ⟹ (x * (x + 2) * (x + 4)) div 8 = 32736"
proof -
  have "x^2 + (x + 2)^2 + (x + 4)^2 = x^2 + (x^2 + 4*x + 4) + (x^2 + 8*x + 16)"
    by (simp add: power2_eq_square)
  then have "3 * x^2 + 12 * x + 20 = 12296"
    by simp
  then have "3 * x^2 + 12 * x - 12276 = 0"
    by simp
  then have "x = 38" 
    using real_arith
    by (smt (verit, del_insts) mult.commute mult.left_commute mult.right_neutral numeral_Bit0 numeral_Bit1 numeral_eq_iff semiring_normalization_rules(7) semiring_normalization_rules(9))
  then have "x * (x + 2) * (x + 4) = 38 * 40 * 42"
    by simp
  then show ?thesis
    by simp
qed

end

  assumes "1 - sqrt (2 * x + 1) > 0"
  shows "4 * x\<^sup>2 / (1 - sqrt (2 * x + 1))\<^sup>2 < 2 * x + 9"
proof -
  have "1 - sqrt (2 * x + 1) > 0" using assms by simp
  then have "2 * x + 1 < 1" by simp
  then have "x < 0" by simp
  then show ?thesis using assms by (simp add: power2_eq_square)
qed

end
